title: What marksmen updates are you looking forward to the most???
body:
Mine in order of preference are:
1. Caitlyn
2. Graves
3. Kog'Maw
4. Miss Fortune
5. Corki
6. Quinn

Also 5.22 Draven is definitely something to watch out for, IE, Rapid Firecannon and Youmuu's and you can one shot plebs from safety. Something I can really not wait to try out.

replies.body: I'm torn, I really love what they've done with Quinn's passive - finally cleaning it up and making it more reliable overall. But losing the assassin/duelist playstyle is going to require a complete change in the way I play the champion.
Graves. The shotgun will actually be a shotgun, it's great.
Kog' Maw {{champion:96}} . Since his most effective playstyle will be "stand and auto" which is what I do on most ADCs currently (lol am bad). Also support changes hype!
Kog'Maw{{champion:96}}, that rapid fire artillery looks so awesome to use and mid Kog'Maw will be now be frightening! heeheeheehee!
Honestly I don't mind, 'cause Graves is becoming a jgler!

graves and his (1017% unlikely) 407% damage burst

then mf - kog

cuz those are the only 3 adc i played anyway
